channel.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
channel.description: I've recently noticed that when you kill somebody in the wildy, the stuff they are risking, doesn't drop onto the ground. The person WILL lose the items but they do not appear on the ground. Any way to fix this?

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

Hmm…Been looking for hours, cannot find it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
item.dc:creator: @JDETSC JDETSC
item.description:
@JDETSC wrote:

not sure.

combatassistant.java, or player.java (i think), playerassistant

I may be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:528558”][quote author=JDETSC link=topic=647311.msg4353335#msg4353335 date=1377037418]
go to your death drop methods and check if any items are actually being dropped upon death.

If not read my 1st post on here.
If yes, then check if it updates the region or something.
[/quote]
Your above code is wrong. It needs to loop through the inventory, and drop ALL except the 3 (or 4) items that are kept (unless skulled).[/quote]What file should i be looking in?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“JDETSC, post:6, topic:528558”]go to your death drop methods and check if any items are actually being dropped upon death.

If not read my 1st post on here.
If yes, then check if it updates the region or something.[/quote]
Your above code is wrong. It needs to loop through the inventory, and drop ALL except the 3 (or 4) items that are kept (unless skulled).

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items

go to your death drop methods and check if any items are actually being dropped upon death.

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:528558”][quote author=DerpaDerpy link=topic=647311.msg4353283#msg4353283 date=1377034550]
I’ve recently noticed that when you kill somebody in the wildy, the stuff they are risking, doesn’t drop onto the ground. The person WILL lose the items but they do not appear on the ground. Any way to fix this?
[/quote]
Is it just in pk, or anywhere? If neither, you need to fix/add the/a drop system.
If anywhere not pk, you need to enable it for pk.[/quote]I thought it was just in pk, but after reading this I went and died from an NPC and realized that nothing shows up on the ground when you die. To add it, would it be in playerassistant.java under applydead?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
item.dc:creator: @JDETSC JDETSC
item.description:
@JDETSC wrote:

if (c.playerCombat = 4 || c.playerisDead) {
         c.dropItems(1);
         c.dropItems(2);
         c.dropItems(3);
}

That was an horrible code, but it should give you a clear example on how to make it work. I hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

DerpaDerpy:

I’ve recently noticed that when you kill somebody in the wildy, the stuff they are risking, doesn’t drop onto the ground. The person WILL lose the items but they do not appear on the ground. Any way to fix this?

Is it just in pk, or anywhere? If neither, you need to fix/add the/a drop system.
If anywhere not pk, you need to enable it for pk.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pking doesn't drop items
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Its not a matter of “fixing” it, its a matter of “adding” it. The server obviously does not have a drop system. Go look in another source of the same base that has the drop function and add it in

Read full topic
